mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_detail (goods_id, id, detail, notice, b_time, program, service, prod1, prod3, prod6, prod12, prod1sale, prod3sale, prod6sale, prod12sale, prod1retail, prod3retail, prod6retail, prod12retail, cate) VALUES (#{goods_id}, #{id}, #{detail}, #{notice}, #{b_time}, #{program}, #{service}, #{prod1}, #{prod3}, #{prod6}, #{prod12}, #{prod1sale}, #{prod3sale}, #{prod6sale}, #{prod12sale}, #{prod1retail}, #{prod3retail}, #{prod6retail}, #{prod12retail}, #{cate});
